A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: \"Just breathe\" and go see it a second time.  Enjoy what you liked about it and let go of the anger over the things most of us felt were lacking.  Vitriol over such things leads only to our own harm.  \"Anger leads to hate. Hate leads to suffering.\"  There are\, truly\, horrible and heartbreaking things in this world to\, justifiably\, hate; this movie is not one of them.
